solution:
```python
def reconstruct_tree(preorder, inorder):
    if not preorder or not inorder:
        return []

    root = preorder[0]
    root_index = inorder.index(root)

    left_inorder = inorder[:root_index]
    right_inorder = inorder[root_index + 1:]

    left_preorder = []
    right_preorder = []

    for i in preorder:
        if i in left_inorder:
            left_preorder.append(i)
        elif i in right_inorder:
            right_preorder.append(i)

    left_postorder = reconstruct_tree(left_preorder, left_inorder)
    right_postorder = reconstruct_tree(right_preorder, right_inorder)

    return left_postorder + right_postorder + [root]

n = int(input())
preorder = list(map(int, input().split()))
inorder = list(map(int, input().split()))

postorder = reconstruct_tree(preorder, inorder)
print(*postorder)
```
